commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: Anyway, now that the event is over, we can finally take a break.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Yeah, we all worked really hard leading up to the event. Should we start thinking about what's next for us?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Listen up, everyone! Sorry to keep you so busy, but I've already found our next event!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Ta-da!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Let's see. Whoa! Look at this! It says we can win a spot to perform on the main stage at the School Idol Festival!

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: The main stage at the School Idol Festival? Only the top school idols are able to perform there!

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: What?! That's amazing!

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: B-But, that means we will be up against some tough competitors, right?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah. I expect there to be participants from all over the country.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: Rina-chan Board says, "Dizzyyy..."

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: We were nervous enough performing on that other stage.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: This sounds like a huge step up. I think at our current skill level, that's a very tall order, no?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I think we can do it!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I was watching you all from the audience, and you shined so much while performing!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Did you look at the people in the audience from up on the stage?

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: A-Actually, not really.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: Me neither. I was too busy thinking about myself.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: They all looked like they were having a ball! Anyway, I'm convinced that it's only a matter of time before you end up performing at a big competition. So, why wait?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Let's go for it!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: Go for it? I guess you're right. A lot of the time, when you try something, it ends up being really fun.

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: Hmm. Well, if you say so.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: I guess it can't hurt to try.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: Let's do it! It's our chief's idea, after all!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Is everyone ready for this?

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: I'll have to update my Rina-chan Board.

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: I'll come up with an even more efficient way to nap, and put that extra time and energy towards practicing!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: That's the spirit, everyone! All right, let's aim for the main stage and try our best!

commands.speaker: Everyone
commands.line: Yeah!

commands.speaker: Ai
commands.line: But if we're gonna be competing against veterans from all across the country, it sounds like we need a plan.

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: I agree. But what should that be? We'll continue polishing our individual skills of course, but what else can we do?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Actually, I had some thoughts about that that I wanted to share with you all.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: What is it?

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: For this next competition, what do you think about entering as a group?

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: What? I thought we decided to leverage our individual personalities and try our best as solo acts?

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: That idea makes me a little nervous.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: I like the way things are right now, too.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Oh, I'm not saying we should give up on the solo acts or anything!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: But, umm, the thing that got me into school idols in the first place was seeing the Î¼'s and Aqours joint performance.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: What? You got to see that?!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Yeah. The intensity they had on stage with their strengths combined was incredible. I can still remember every detail.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Even though each member stood out on her own, they were still in harmony. It was like they were lifting each other up. It's hard to explain, but it was truly amazing.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I wish I could see a performance like that from my beloved Nijigasaki. On stage the other day, Ayumu and Kasumi seemed a little nervous at first.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: I thought maybe it'd be more reassuring if you were all on stage together.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Wh-What are you talking about? I wasn't nervous.

commands.speaker: Shizuku
commands.line: Oh, don't lie. Your voice was shaking a little at the start.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Sh-Shizuko!

commands.speaker: Kanata
commands.line: A group, huh? I guess those of us who were in the club to start are probably more resistant to the idea. But I think I wouldn't mind it so much now.

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: Yeah, maybe we should give it another try. It won't be like last time.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: But!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Don't worry, Setsuna. You're not the type of person to make the same mistakes over again. None of us are.

commands.speaker: Setsuna
commands.line: I might get carried away again.

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: That's why you have me. I'll do my best to support you!

commands.speaker: Karin
commands.line: You should just give in, Setsuna. Our chief is quite stubborn.

commands.speaker: Rina
commands.line: A group might be okay. Maybe we'll learn why you became obsessed with school idols.

commands.speaker: Kasumi
commands.line: Hmph. I guess I have no choice. But even if it's a group, I have to be the center!

commands.speaker: Emma
commands.line: There's still time until the event. We can make it if we work really hard!

commands.speaker: Ayumu
commands.line: That's true. Maybe we should take on this new challenge!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Thank you, everyone!

commands.speaker: [player]
commands.line: Let's discover the hidden charms of the Nijigasaki idol group!
